  <description>

      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>08a5ca1c-2107-11d8-8380-000acd021b2b#1#8</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A keresztes hadjáratok</string>
            <string language="en">The crusades</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Kreuzzüge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les croisades</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os crusades</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I crusades</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σταυροφορίες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las cruzadas</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A keresztes hadjáratok története, a keresztes államok</string>
            <string language="en">The history of the crusades, the crusader towns</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Szentföld,  lovag,  Bizánc,  Clermont,  II. Orbán,  </string>
            <string language="en">Holy land, knight, Byzantium, Clermont, Urban II.</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Geschichte der Kreuzzüge, die 
Kreuzfahrerstädte</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'histoire des croisades, les villes de croisé</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O history dos crusades, as cidades do cruzado</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La storia dei crusades, le città del crociato</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ιστορία των σταυροφοριών, οι πόλεις σταυροφόρων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La historia de las cruzadas, las ciudades del 
cruzado</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heiliges Land, Ritter, Byzanz, Clermont, städtisches 
II.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Terre sainte, chevalier, Byzance, Clermont, II urbain.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Terra holy, knight, Byzantium, Clermont, II urbano.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Terra santa, cavaliere, Byzantium, Clermont, II urbano.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγιοι Τόποι, ιππότης, Βυζάντιο, Clermont, αστικό ΙΙ.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pista santa, caballero, Byzantium, Clermont, II urbano.</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
